Name: Mi Lobie
Review Text: This restaurant has a definite problem with higene. It's greasy, dirty and needs a fix up. We ordered anyway and luckily so. The food was nice. I'm happy I didn't see the kitchen thoughüòâ

Name: Mi Lobie
Review Text: Very nice Chinese-style Surinamese. Enough space to sit.

Name: Mi Lobie
Review Text: Delicious roti and other dishes. Maybe the best of Amsterdam. Great prices too! Not such a great atmosphere. Take away or ordering is better. ;)

Name: Mi Lobie
Review Text: Very nice food, not expensive, friendly owners who advise you on allergens and ingredients. Not the most cosy restaurant but you won‚Äôt regret eating here!

Name: Mi Lobie
Review Text: The food was very good, i really like number 82 (shrimps) and the delivery guys are very polite! I don't understand the negative reviews!

Name: Mi Lobie
Review Text: Good food. Cheap and fast. Also delivery posible. Lovely lady behind counter. Good restaurant

Name: Mi Lobie
Review Text: If you want to eat something classic from "Suriname" this is a good place. Try the Moksi.
